titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the provision of law requiring termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 1999.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/7/1999--Introduced. Repeals a Federal provision requiring the termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 1999.
